channel.title: git on WY Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content in git on WY Computer Science

item.title: Git-ting Started
item.description: Downloads for Home Git package for all operating systems. Tortoise Git for Windows only. Tutorials A command line intro to git in 15 minutes. Git for Beginners. Beautiful and simple Git Guide. Local instructions Make an account on GitHub. Use your CPS email. Apply for an education account. Join our class in the GitHub Classroom. (Tell the teacher your username and get added manually.

item.title: Everyday Git
item.description: Everyday Commands All of these need to be run in the karel-* directory: ./save-it ./update: git pull from the upstream repository. git pull Merge Conflicts Sometimes you will modify a file at home without having saved (pushed) your changes at school. This causes a dreaded “merge conflict” when you update. Simple Merging If you are lucky, you are at school and you know that you just want to use the code from home (the “incoming code” from the pull).
